Question: Starting in 2003, this person starred with her then-husband Nick Lachey in the MTV reality show Newlyweds: Nick and Jessica.
Hints: In March 2007, this person donated a new Chrysler minivan to the Elim orphanage in Nuevo Laredo.

Initially, this person planned to release a new studio album that would end her contract with her label, Epic Records.
